effect.@en: When combat begins, the Blackbird may move freely in this armor for their [BB] in Turns before fatigue becomes an issue. At the end of the last Turn and every Turn thereafter, make a successful Toughness test for the wearer, or they gain 1 level of Peril from exhaustion. If a Blackbird chooses to travel in Heavy armor, they accumulate 1 level of Peril every hour.
